name: X-Ray Scanner Body Prank
description:
This app is intended for entertainment purposes only and does not provide true X-Ray.
X-ray body scanners Prank - joke is a game application where you can make a joke x-ray body scanner via phone! Raffle other pretend like it's a real X-rays!
How to use:
1. Turn on x-rays, the camera will automatically connect.
2.Navedite on the part of the case, to bring more credibility to the whole person.
3. Press the old scan, after scanning the image will appear!
For good effect, you need to practice!
ATTENTION! The game is completely safe for your health! As it is completely free and you can use it without an internet connection!
Thank you for playing with us leave us your feedback and we will make the game even better and more interesting for you!
